awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE EKLUTNA NATIVE VILLAGE IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3) BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4) BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5) BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES AND CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATERSHED PROTECTION AND CLIMATE CHANGE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; DEVELOPING EKLUTNA RIVER RESTORATION PLANS; AND DEVELOPING AN EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT PLAN.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE EKLUTNA NATIVE VILLAGE, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.   ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; FINANCIAL REPORTS; COPIES OF OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RIVER RESTORATION PLANS; AND AN EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT PLAN.

DESCRIPTION:THIS PROJECT WILL ASSIST THE EKLUTNA NATIVE VILLAGE IN BUILDING CAPACITIES AND DEVELOPING PROGRAMS TO PROTECT THE TRIBAL ENVIRONMENT AND HEALTH.  OBJECTIVES/WORKPLAN COMPONENTS INCLUDE: 1. BUILDING ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY; 2. BUILDING PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY; 3. BUILDING COMMUNICATIONS CAPACITY; 4. BUILDING SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTE MANAGEMENT CAPACITY; AND 5. BUILDING TECHNICAL CAPACITY.ACTIVITIES:WORKPLAN ACTIVITIES/TASKS INCLUDE: MAINTAINING AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND ADMINISTRATIVE AND PROGRAM MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS; ATTENDING TRAINING AND RESEARCHING ISSUES AND RESOURCES; COMMUNICATING INTERNALLY AND EXTERNALLY ABOUT ISSUES; CONDUCTING COMMUNITY EDUCATION ACTIVITIES; CONDUCTING RECYCLING ACTIVITIES; BUILDING TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE OF WATER, WATERSHEDS, ENERGY, AND WASTE; DEVELOPING AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY; AND ASSISTING WITH EKLUTNA RIVER MONITORING AND MANAGEMENT PLANNING.  SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROJECT ARE THE EKLUTNA NATIVE VILLAGE/ NATIVE VILLAGE OF EKLUTNA, TRIBAL MEMBERS, AND THE LOCAL PUBLIC.  THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES OF THIS PROJECT INCLUDE: INCREASING TRIBAL ADMINISTRATIVE CAPACITY TO RESPOND TO LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS; INCREASING TRIBAL PROGRAMMATIC CAPACITY TO ASSESS LOCAL ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES; INCREASING COMMUNITY KNOWLEDGE OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES AND ACTIONS PROTECTIVE OF THE ENVIRONMENT; DECREASING AMOUNTS OF RECYCLABLES AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENTERING LANDFILL; AND INCREASING TRIBAL TECHNICAL CAPACITIES TO PRIORITIZE ENVIRONMENTAL NEEDS AND DEVELOP PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THEM.  ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE: PERFORMANCE REPORTS; OUTREACH MATERIALS; EVENT SUMMARY REPORTS; RECYCLING REPORTS; MEMORANDUMS OF AGREEMENTS; AND AN UPDATED ENVIRONMENTAL INVENTORY.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
